author: filmaj
msg: Added some TODOs for geolocation tests, updated test running script so it is slightly more robust.

author: brock@sintaxi.com
msg: We do not require an ID for reading, only writing

author: filmaj
msg: Added a bit better load event handling, so that it works across all of the PhoneGap-supported platforms. Of course, have to make an exception for BlackBerry :P

author: filmaj
msg: Fixed a spec for Reachability: success callbacks should return an object with a `code` member.

author: filmaj
msg: Fixed type tests for device: some of the browsers with native implementations of device need to be cast to string to pass typeof tests.
